alert.note: Alert for Logan; Scott (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Logan and northern Scott Counties through 930 AM CST... At 900 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Heavener Runestone State Park, or 11 miles southeast of Poteau, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Booneville... Waldron... Mansfield... Echo... Oliver... Morgan Springs... Bates... Barber... Black Fork... Cauthron... Winfield... Hon... Lucas... Chismville... Liberty... Sugar Grove... Carolan... Grayson... Glendale in Logan County... Ione... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
